artworks.description: After the big blast Tak created, she came back like this.

artworks.title: DnD thing- After Tak killed everyone
artworks.description: Yes, I killed everyone in my dnd party. But they survived and so did I. I did have to sell my soul to another gos but... that's DndD

artworks.title: Niandra DnD character
artworks.description: Niandra is a DnD character played by one of my DnD groupmates. He died in a battle with skeletons. RIP Niandra.

artworks.title: Tak
artworks.description: Tak is my DnD character- a Tiefling Hexblade Warlock. First ever character I made for DnD.

artworks.title: Draven puppymaid
artworks.description: Draven is a musician. He is in a music collective Life gets worse, and similar to xaduma, also joked about maid dresses and femboys. Well... here.

artworks.title: Vilkace
artworks.description: Vilkace is my alter ego persona based on the name i choose in all games- Vilkace.

artworks.title: Xaduma catmaid
artworks.description: Xaduma is a musician. He is in a music collective Life gets worse, and joked about someone drawing him as a catmaid. I was the one to do it.

artworks.description: A music collective. They hosted a competition so I did artwork for it.
